summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1157, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue West, certain other streets and certain parts of certain other streets therein names, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12926 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
